497.question: Is CRWIZ already used for data collection, what are the results?

6-Figure4-1.png: Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that the top-10 Emergency Assistant dialogue acts have been collected from CRWIZ.</s>
Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that CRWIZ has collected 200,000 dialogues.</s>
9-Table5-1.png: Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results are that it is efficient and the data quality is good.</s>
Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that CRWIZ has collected 4.9M data.</s>
6-Figure5-1.png: Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that there are 1,000,000 dialogues in the CRWIZ dataset.</s>
Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that there are 1,000,000 dialogues in the CRWIZ dataset.</s>
7-Table3-1.png: Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that 7.14% of the dialogues collected are requests, 20.31% are interactions, 20.19% are actions, and 52.36% are updates.</s>
Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that CRWIZ collected 7.14% of the dialogues, with a total of 52.36% of the dialogues being updates.</s>
8-Table4-1.png: Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results are: Mean: 3.6241, Median: 3.6241, Mode: 3.6241, and SD: 0.21.</s>
Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that the Mean, Median, Mode, and Standard Deviation (SD) for CRWIZ are 4.0044, 4.0044, 4.0044, and 0.07 respectively.</s>
7-Table2-1.png: Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results are: Number of Terms - 25,22 (9.49), Number of Operator Turns - 7,99 (9.66), Number of Emergency Assistant Turns - 17,23 (7.97), Operator Turn Length (words) - 3,88 (0.69), and Emergency Assistant Turn Length (words) - 2,29 (6.16).</s>

Yes, CRWIZ is already used for data collection. The results show that the mean number of turns is 25.22, the mean number of operator turns is 7.99, the mean number of emergency assistant turns is 17.23, the mean operator turn length is 3.88 words, and the mean emergency assistant turn length is 2.29 words.</s>

497.answer: Yes, CRWIZ has been used for data collection and its initial use resulted in 145 dialogues. The average time taken for the task was close to the estimate of 10 minutes, 14 dialogues (9.66%) resolved the emergency in the scenario, and these dialogues rated consistently higher in subjective and objective ratings than those which did not resolve the emergency. Qualitative results showed that participants believed that they were interacting with an automated assistant.
